<script>
// Initialize state from localStorage
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  loadProgress();
  loadLibrary();
  updateProgressDisplay();
});

// Progress tracking
function markComplete(activityNum) {
  const checkbox = document.getElementById('complete-activity' + activityNum);
  const progress = getProgress();
  progress['activity' + activityNum] = checkbox.checked;
  localStorage.setItem('teaching-with-ai-progress', JSON.stringify(progress));
  updateProgressDisplay();
  checkCompletion();
}

function getProgress() {
  const saved = localStorage.getItem('teaching-with-ai-progress');
  return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : {};
}

function loadProgress() {
  const progress = getProgress();
  for (let i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {
    const checkbox = document.getElementById('complete-activity' + i);
    if (checkbox && progress['activity' + i]) {
      checkbox.checked = true;
    }
  }
}

function updateProgressDisplay() {
  const progress = getProgress();
  for (let i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {
    const el = document.getElementById('progress-activity' + i);
    if (el) {
      if (progress['activity' + i]) {
        el.style.background = '#c6f6d5';
        el.style.border = '2px solid #38a169';
      } else {
        el.style.background = '#f7fafc';
        el.style.border = 'none';
      }
    }
  }
}

function checkCompletion() {
  const progress = getProgress();
  const allComplete = progress.activity1 && progress.activity2 && progress.activity3 && progress.activity4;
  const completionSection = document.getElementById('completion-section');
  if (allComplete) {
    completionSection.style.display = 'block';
    localStorage.setItem('teaching-with-ai-completed', 'true');
    // Trigger BadgeQuest completion if available
    if (typeof reportCompletion === 'function') {
      reportCompletion('teaching-with-ai');
    }
  } else {
    completionSection.style.display = 'none';
  }
}

// RTCF Example Display
function showRTCFExample(type) {
  const display = document.getElementById('rtcf-example-display');
  if (type === 'vague') {
    display.innerHTML = '<p style="margin: 0 0 10px 0; color: #e53e3e; font-weight: bold;">Vague Prompt:</p><p style="margin: 0; font-family: \'Courier New\', monospace; color: #333;">"Help me make a rubric for my class."</p><p style="margin: 15px 0 0 0; color: #666; font-style: italic;">This prompt lacks specificity. AI doesn\'t know what class, what assessment, what criteria matter, or how detailed you want the rubric.</p>';
  } else if (type === 'rtcf') {
    display.innerHTML = '<p style="margin: 0 0 10px 0; color: #38a169; font-weight: bold;">RTCF Prompt:</p><p style="margin: 0; font-family: \'Courier New\', monospace; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #333; white-space: pre-wrap;"><strong style="color: #e53e3e;">Role:</strong> You are an experienced curriculum designer who specializes in outcome-based assessment.\n\n<strong style="color: #dd6b20;">Task:</strong> Create a rubric for assessing critical thinking in student essays.\n\n<strong style="color: #38a169;">Context:</strong> This is for a second-year marketing strategy unit. Students write 2000-word case analyses. The rubric is worth 30% of their grade. The cohort includes many international students.\n\n<strong style="color: #3182ce;">Format:</strong> 4-point scale (Excellent, Good, Developing, Beginning) with clear descriptors for each level. Table format that can be pasted into Word.</p>';
  } else if (type === 'result') {
    display.innerHTML = '<p style="margin: 0 0 10px 0; color: #805ad5; font-weight: bold;">Why the RTCF Version Works:</p><ul style="margin: 0; color: #333; line-height: 1.8;"><li><strong>Role</strong> primes AI with relevant expertise and perspective</li><li><strong>Task</strong> is specific and actionable‚ÄîAI knows exactly what to produce</li><li><strong>Context</strong> provides the constraints and audience info AI needs</li><li><strong>Format</strong> ensures output is immediately usable</li></ul><p style="margin: 15px 0 0 0; color: #666;">The result? A rubric you can actually use, not a generic template you\'ll spend an hour customizing.</p>';
  }
}

// Prompt Preview Builder
function updatePromptPreview() {
  const role = document.getElementById('rtcf-role').value;
  const task = document.getElementById('rtcf-task').value;
  const context = document.getElementById('rtcf-context').value;
  const format = document.getElementById('rtcf-format').value;

  let preview = '';
  if (role) preview += role + '\n\n';
  if (task) preview += task + '\n\n';
  if (context) preview += 'Context:\n' + context + '\n\n';
  if (format) preview += 'Format: ' + format;

  const previewEl = document.getElementById('prompt-preview');
  previewEl.textContent = preview || 'Fill in the fields above to build your prompt...';
}

function copyPrompt() {
  const preview = document.getElementById('prompt-preview').textContent;
  navigator.clipboard.writeText(preview).then(function() {
    alert('Prompt copied to clipboard!');
  });
}

function loadTemplate(type) {
  const templates = {
    lecture: {
      role: 'You are an expert educator who creates engaging, interactive lectures.',
      task: 'Create a 50-minute lecture outline on [TOPIC].',
      context: 'Course: [COURSE NAME]\nLevel: [YEAR LEVEL]\nClass size: [NUMBER] students\nPrevious week covered: [TOPIC]',
      format: 'Structured outline with timing, activities, and discussion prompts for each section.'
    },
    quiz: {
      role: 'You are an assessment specialist who creates questions testing understanding, not just recall.',
      task: 'Create 10 multiple-choice questions on [TOPIC] at varying Bloom\'s taxonomy levels.',
      context: 'Unit: [UNIT NAME]\nStudents have completed: [READINGS/TOPICS]\nThis quiz is formative / summative (choose one)',
      format: 'For each question: stem, 4 options, correct answer, brief explanation, and Bloom\'s level.'
    },
    feedback: {
      role: 'You are a supportive but rigorous academic who helps students improve their work.',
      task: 'Provide developmental feedback on the following student submission.',
      context: 'Assignment: [ASSIGNMENT TYPE]\nMarking criteria: [KEY CRITERIA]\nStudent level: [YEAR]',
      format: 'Start with strengths, then areas for improvement with specific suggestions, end with encouragement.'
    },
    rubric: {
      role: 'You are a curriculum designer specializing in criterion-referenced assessment.',
      task: 'Create an assessment rubric for [ASSIGNMENT TYPE].',
      context: 'Unit: [UNIT NAME]\nLearning outcomes being assessed: [LIST]\nWeighting: [%] of final grade\nSubmission format: [TYPE]',
      format: '4-point scale (Excellent/Good/Developing/Beginning) in table format with clear, observable descriptors.'
    }
  };

  const template = templates[type];
  document.getElementById('rtcf-role').value = template.role;
  document.getElementById('rtcf-task').value = template.task;
  document.getElementById('rtcf-context').value = template.context;
  document.getElementById('rtcf-format').value = template.format;
  updatePromptPreview();
}

// Technique Display
function showTechnique(technique) {
  const detail = document.getElementById('technique-detail');
  const title = document.getElementById('technique-title');
  const content = document.getElementById('technique-content');

  const techniques = {
    board: {
      title: 'Board of Directors Prompting',
      content: '<p style="margin: 0 0 15px 0; color: #333;"><strong>Purpose:</strong> Get multiple perspectives on any decision, plan, or document.</p><p style="margin: 0 0 15px 0; color: #333;"><strong>When to use:</strong> Planning projects, making strategic decisions, reviewing documents before finalizing, understanding stakeholder concerns.</p><div style="background: #1a365d; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; margin-bottom: 15px;"><p style="margin: 0; font-family: \'Courier New\', monospace; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #e2e8f0; white-space: pre-wrap;">I have [document/plan/decision].\n\nPlease analyse this from the perspectives of:\n- A [stakeholder 1]\n- A [stakeholder 2]\n- A [stakeholder 3]\n- A [stakeholder 4]\n\nFor each perspective, identify:\n1. Their primary concerns\n2. What they would want changed\n3. How they would evaluate success</p></div><p style="margin: 0; color: #666; font-style: italic;"><strong>Tip:</strong> Choose stakeholders with genuinely different interests‚Äînot just different job titles.</p>'
    },

function closeTechnique() {
  document.getElementById('technique-detail').style.display = 'none';
}

// Context Tabs
function showContextTab(tab) {
  // Hide all tabs
  document.getElementById('context-teaching').style.display = 'none';
  document.getElementById('context-research').style.display = 'none';
  document.getElementById('context-admin').style.display = 'none';

  // Reset all tab buttons
  document.getElementById('tab-teaching').style.background = '#e2e8f0';
  document.getElementById('tab-teaching').style.color = '#333';
  document.getElementById('tab-research').style.background = '#e2e8f0';
  document.getElementById('tab-research').style.color = '#333';
  document.getElementById('tab-admin').style.background = '#e2e8f0';
  document.getElementById('tab-admin').style.color = '#333';

  // Show selected tab
  document.getElementById('context-' + tab).style.display = 'block';
  document.getElementById('tab-' + tab).style.background = '#3182ce';
  document.getElementById('tab-' + tab).style.color = 'white';
}

// Prompt Library
function saveLibrary() {
  const library = {
    task1: document.getElementById('library-task-1').value,
    prompt1: document.getElementById('library-prompt-1').value,
    task2: document.getElementById('library-task-2').value,
    prompt2: document.getElementById('library-prompt-2').value,
    task3: document.getElementById('library-task-3').value,
    prompt3: document.getElementById('library-prompt-3').value
  };
  localStorage.setItem('teaching-with-ai-library', JSON.stringify(library));
}

function loadLibrary() {
  const saved = localStorage.getItem('teaching-with-ai-library');
  if (saved) {
    const library = JSON.parse(saved);
    document.getElementById('library-task-1').value = library.task1 || '';
    document.getElementById('library-prompt-1').value = library.prompt1 || '';
    document.getElementById('library-task-2').value = library.task2 || '';
    document.getElementById('library-prompt-2').value = library.prompt2 || '';
    document.getElementById('library-task-3').value = library.task3 || '';
    document.getElementById('library-prompt-3').value = library.prompt3 || '';
  }
}

function exportLibrary() {
  const library = {
    task1: document.getElementById('library-task-1').value,
    prompt1: document.getElementById('library-prompt-1').value,
    task2: document.getElementById('library-task-2').value,
    prompt2: document.getElementById('library-prompt-2').value,
    task3: document.getElementById('library-task-3').value,
    prompt3: document.getElementById('library-prompt-3').value
  };

  let text = 'MY AI PROMPT LIBRARY\n';
  text += 'Teaching WITH AI - AI Skills Passport\n';
  text += '====================================\n\n';

  if (library.task1 || library.prompt1) {
    text += 'PROMPT 1: ' + (library.task1 || 'Untitled') + '\n';
    text += '-'.repeat(40) + '\n';
    text += library.prompt1 + '\n\n';
  }

  if (library.task2 || library.prompt2) {
    text += 'PROMPT 2: ' + (library.task2 || 'Untitled') + '\n';
    text += '-'.repeat(40) + '\n';
    text += library.prompt2 + '\n\n';
  }

  if (library.task3 || library.prompt3) {
    text += 'PROMPT 3: ' + (library.task3 || 'Untitled') + '\n';
    text += '-'.repeat(40) + '\n';
    text += library.prompt3 + '\n\n';
  }

  const blob = new Blob([text], { type: 'text/plain' });
  const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
  const a = document.createElement('a');
  a.href = url;
  a.download = 'my-ai-prompt-library.txt';
  a.click();
  URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
}

function clearLibrary() {
  if (confirm('Are you sure you want to clear all prompts? This cannot be undone.')) {
    document.getElementById('library-task-1').value = '';
    document.getElementById('library-prompt-1').value = '';
    document.getElementById('library-task-2').value = '';
    document.getElementById('library-prompt-2').value = '';
    document.getElementById('library-task-3').value = '';
    document.getElementById('library-prompt-3').value = '';
    localStorage.removeItem('teaching-with-ai-library');
  }
}

  card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
    this.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';

  });
});
